item.title: By: Koen Verbeeck
item.dc:creator: Koen Verbeeck
item.description:
Hi Daniel,
first step would be to check the SharePoint logs. You can use ULS viewer for that.
item.content:encoded:
Hi Daniel,

first step would be to check the SharePoint logs. You can use ULS viewer for that.

item.title: By: Daniel Martins
item.dc:creator: Daniel Martins
item.description:
Hello,
I tried the solution to make the dashboard work, but when I try to change the Authentication Settings for Excel Services to none and try to proceed I receive errors. The erros are something like: "PowerPivot Web service returned an error (This request could not be redirected to a PowerPivot for SharePoint server. An internal occurred. Please look in the SharePoint logs for more informationor contact the administrator of this farm.)"
Do you have any sugestion?
Thanks in advance!
item.content:encoded:
Hello,

I tried the solution to make the dashboard work, but when I try to change the Authentication Settings for Excel Services to none and try to proceed I receive errors. The erros are something like:
“PowerPivot Web service returned an error (This request could not be redirected to a PowerPivot for SharePoint server. An internal occurred. Please look in the SharePoint logs for more informationor contact the administrator of this farm.)”

Do you have any sugestion?

Thanks in advance!

item.title: By: Kenny Barrett
item.dc:creator: Kenny Barrett
item.description: Thank you for the detailed information. I look forward to when #9 and higher are posted in this set.
item.content:encoded: Thank you for the detailed information. I look forward to when #9 and higher are posted in this set.
